definition: Jincheng prefecture-level city in Shanxi 山西
surname Jin/the Jin Dynasties (265-420)/Western Jin 西晉|西晋[Xi1 Jin4] (265-316), Eastern Jin 東晉|东晋[Dong1 Jin4] (317-420) and Later Jin Dynasty (936-946)/short name for Shanxi province 山西[Shan1 xi1]
to move forward/to promote/to advance
city walls/city/town/CL:座[zuo4],道[dao4],個|个[ge4]
market/city/CL:個|个[ge4]

sentences.english: Located in the bank of Dan River that is about 13km southeast of the city proper of Jincheng.
sentences.chinese: 珏山位於晉城市區東南13公里處的丹河南岸。

sentences.english: To introduce funds and unite to rebuild Jincheng Municipal Cinema.
sentences.chinese: 引進資金，聯合新建晉城市電影院。

sentences.english: Jincheng Municipal Public Security Bureau deputy director Zhao Jianyun said.
sentences.chinese: 晉城市公安局副局長趙建雲說。

sentences.english: Jincheng City is one of the cities with more serious air pollution in Shanxi Province.
sentences.chinese: 晉城市是山西省空氣污染較重的城市之一。
